Description: Qualifications/Experience Essential Technical Skills: ·       Degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management with minimum 5 years of experience in Highway, Rail Design/Construction projects and with minimum 3 years’ experience as a BIM/CAD Specialist in design and construction.·       Proficiency in Civil3D together with AutoCAD, Revit.·       Industry BIM Certification (preferred).·       Must have working knowledge of Autodesk and Bentley 3D/BIM authoring Platforms including features, functions, and limitations.·       Working knowledge and proficiency with the following: Collaboration and data management solutions: BIM 360 Suite, Navisworks, 3D/BIM-enabled quantity takeoff and BIM-enabled estimating tools (Assemble, CostX, etc)·       Understanding of project work processes from design, estimation, construction administration and coordination.·       Proficient in English oral and written communications skills. ·       Collaborates well in a team environment·       Ability to manage priorities and take on additional evolving responsibilities. Essential Behavioral Skills: ·       Excellent interpersonal, analytical and communication skills (oral and written).·       Willingness to relocate to the job site in Saudi Arabia.·       Proactive, supportive, inquisitive, challenging and result driven.·       Hard working and motivated with high self-initiative.·       Ability to manage multiple job assignments, changing priorities and work with ambiguity.·       Help others and receive help from others in achieving goals.·       Acknowledge and value contribution from other team members.·       Promote the creation of a work environment, supported by leadership, which fosters openness, trust, communication, teamwork, empowerment, innovation, and satisfaction.Job Details
